SEARCH
Package com.internship.system.model

Class Internship

java.lang.Object
com.internship.system.model.Internship
public class Internship extends Object
Represents an internship posting in the system. Contains all details about the internship including requirements, dates, and status.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Internship

      public Internship(int internshipId, String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, InternshipStatus status, String companyName, String representativeInChargeId, int slots, boolean visible, int confirmedOffers)
      Constructs a new Internship with all specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - unique identifier
      title - title of the position
      description - detailed description
      level - difficulty level
      preferredMajor - preferred major field
      openingDate - date applications open (can be null)
      closingDate - date applications close (can be null)
      status - approval status
      companyName - name of the company
      representativeInChargeId - ID of the managing representative
      slots - total number of slots available
      visible - whether visible to students
      confirmedOffers - number of confirmed offers

    • setVisible

      public void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Sets the visibility.
      Parameters:

    • getConfirmedOffers

      public int getConfirmedOffers()
      Gets the number of confirmed offers.
      Returns:
      the number of confirmed offers

    • setConfirmedOffers

      public void setConfirmedOffers(int confirmedOffers)
      Sets the number of confirmed offers. Automatically updates status to FILLED if all slots are taken, or back to APPROVED if slots become available.
      Parameters:
      confirmedOffers - the new number of confirmed offers

    • hasAvailableSlots

      public boolean hasAvailableSlots()
      Checks if there are available slots.
      Returns:
      true if there are slots available, false otherwise

    • registerConfirmedOffer

      public void registerConfirmedOffer()
      Registers a new confirmed offer. Automatically updates status to FILLED if all slots are taken.

    • revokeConfirmedOffer

      public void revokeConfirmedOffer()
      Revokes a confirmed offer. Automatically updates status back to APPROVED if slots become available.

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility()
      Toggles the visibility of the internship.

    • isOpenOn

      public boolean isOpenOn(LocalDate date)
      Checks if the internship is open for applications on the given date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to check
      Returns:
      true if open on that date, false otherwise

    • validateDates

      public void validateDates()
      Validates that the date range is valid (closing date not before opening date).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if closing date is before opening date
